title: (x) City Guilds - sans - Congress Sans {William L}
content:
I need help locating the name of this font. Thank you for your time

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202021700im_/http:/typophile.com/files/city_3569.jpg)
author: vector

comments.content: Seems very close to [Congress Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202021700/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/clubtype/congress-sans/), but with a modified _G_.
